bibl.title: Translation of a Letter of the praefectus Aegypti.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Mons Claudianus, FW1 room 1 SE 7, AD 186-187. Prefectural letter concerning two soldiers who have abandoned their comrades under attack. - Pp. 50-51: The Language of the Translation.
bibl.seg: Adam Bülow-Jacobsen, Translation of a Letter of the praefectus Aegypti.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 47-51, 1 fig.
